text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt word and I'm
here they don't take orders in Seattle
to tell you about a new feature of
Amazon Athena Athena is an interactive
query service that makes it easy to
analyze data in amazon s3 using standard
SQL an athena now supports querying
encrypted data stored in s3 protecting
sensitive information such as security
logs financial transactions or health
care records is often done by encrypting
however in many cases users need to
decide between encrypting their data or
making it available for analysis one of
the big advantages of AWS is you don't
have to make tough choices with your
data Amazon redshift and Amazon EMR have
long supported analysis on encrypted
data and today we're bringing that
capability to Athena now you can run SQL
queries directly against your encrypted
data in s3 and write encrypted results
back to s3 both server-side encryption
and client-side encryption are supported
enabling you to query your data is
protected at rest in transit and by
Athena's JDBC driver Athena integrates
with the AWS key management service a
managed service that makes it easy to
control the keys and encrypt your data
you can learn more by visiting the
athena website that's it thanks a lot
[Music]
